title: WhatsApp for iOS working on redesigned experience for voice calls
content:
WhatsApp has been working to improve the voice call experience on its app for a while. A new beta version shows that the company is planning a revamped user interface for a future update.

more…

The post WhatsApp for iOS working on redesigned experience for voice calls appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A new beta version shows that WhatsApp is planning a revamped user interface for voice calls in a future update.
